summary: Good looking, intelligent and USEFUL companion. Male Imperial mage.
descriptionHtml:
[img=center] http://rookery9.aviary.com.s3.amazonaws.com/15530500/15530774_6e21.jpg[/img]
[color=#cccc99]Felix was born in 4E 175 into a noble and wealthy family. He has a younger sister, Aemilia. 

His father, Gallio Constantine,  was officially a diplomat for Cyrodiil in many countries of Tamriel prior to the White-Gold Concordat. Unofficially, he was a spy. When the treaty was signed, he was transfered to the office of a liason with the Aldmery Dominion, where he continued his primary line of work of gathering intelligence. His mother, Annthea, was a head of a charity organization helping orphan children. 

Gallio had a passion for collecting artifacts, both well-known and obscure. The collection fascinated young Felix, and he would spend hours trying to figure out the properties of the unidentified objects. That was how he realized he was pretty powerful in magic.

Despite the political turmoil, Felix\'s life was happy and quiet all through his childhood and most of his adolescence. However, this peaceful life was shattered in 4E 192, when his father vanished in the middle of the night. Following his disappearance, several burglaries of the family mansion occurred within one week. Nothing was taken, except for some of the artifacts from the collection. The office where his father worked denied involvement with his disappearance, they also refused to release any information about the cases he worked on or the names of his contacts. However, Felix managed to sneak into his father\'s office and take all of his notes and journals. Everything was written in cypher, but Felix managed to crack parts of the code - enough to give him some names and locations. He left his mother in Aemilia\'s care and embarked on a journey to find his father and return the missing artifacts, feeling the two are connected. 

And now, several years later his leads brought him to Skyrim. Despite the hardships of the recent years, Felix remains optimistic and amicable. He enjoys traveling in company and makes friends easily. He has a light and jovial character, but is fiercely loyal to his friends and loved ones.[/color]

[img] http://rookery9.aviary.com.s3.amazonaws.com/15529500/15529996_e78a.png [/img]
[color=#cc9933] [list]
[*]He\'s very good looking
[*]Higher stature
[*]Essential
[*]Autoleveled up to 80
[*]Doesn\'t affect stealth meter 
[*]A lot of new perks
[*]Changes clothes (apprentice destruction robes) as default outfit and a hide armor set in the inventory 
[*]Complex AI (search well for him before you complain that you can\'t find him!)
[/list]

[img] http://rookery9.aviary.com.s3.amazonaws.com/15530000/15530042_72c0.png [/img]
He lives in the Bannered Mare tavern in Whiterun, so you can find him there from 20:00 till 9:00 (you might need to search the tavern). 
He goes to the Whiterun Market 9:00- 12:00. 
He helps to \"heal\" people in the Whiterun Temple of Kynareth 12:00-20:00.

[img] http://rookery9.aviary.com.s3.amazonaws.com/15530000/15530081_2118.png [/img]

[b][color=#ff9999]THE CONTENT WILL LIKELY BE UPDATED, SO STAY TUNED! :)

URSHI IS THE BRAIN BEHIND THE MOD, REALLY, I JUST MADE IT LOOK PRETTY. ;)[/color][/b]
